dcterms:creator: Mitchell P Marcus
Grace Kim
Mary Ann Marcinkiewicz
Robert MacIntyre
Ann Bies
Mark Ferguson
Karen Katz
Britta Schasberger
dcterms:description: The Penn Treebank is used for part-of-speech tagging, distinguishing 36 categories and punctuation, and serves as a foundational tool in downstream NLP applications.
dcterms:title: Penn Treebank

dcterms:creator: Phil Blunsom
Trevor Cohn
dcterms:description: Brown clusters group word types through a greedy agglomerative clustering according to their mutual information across the corpus based on bigram probabilities.
dcterms:title: Brown clusters

dcterms:creator: Christos Christodoulopoulos
Sharon Goldwater
Mark Steedman
dcterms:description: The dataset for unsupervised part-of-speech induction is used to evaluate various models and approaches in the context of tag induction.
dcterms:title: Unsupervised POS induction
